abstract: Subtracts the product of two double-precision complex matrices from a double-precision complex matrix.

declaration.code: extern void vDSP_zmsmD(const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __A, vDSP_Stride __IA, const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __B, vDSP_Stride __IB, const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __C, vDSP_Stride __IC, const DSPDoubleSplitComplex * __D, vDSP_Stride __ID, vDSP_Length __M, vDSP_Length __N, vDSP_Length __P);

overview:
## Discussion

The following code subtracts the product of matrices `a` and `b from` the matrix `c`, and writes the result to matrix `d`:

items.description: Subtracts a single-precision complex matrix from the product of two single-precision complex matrices.
items.name: vDSP_zmms

items.description: Subtracts a double-precision complex matrix from the product of two double-precision complex matrices.
items.name: vDSP_zmmsD

items.description: Subtracts the product of two single-precision complex matrices from a single-precision complex matrix.
items.name: vDSP_zmsm

title: vDSP_zmsmD
